project_descr: This project will establish sustainable pathways for families affected by the Marawi conflict to gain improved access to livelihood opportunities, especially through the use of innovative financial services and products, including Islamic finance

outputs.output_descr: 10,000 most vulnerable IDPs gain immediate access to basic needs, 84% of which through unconditional cash grants and 16% through emergency employment or asset recovery

project_title: financial inclusion for recovery of marawi
